name: 1Code
description: An open-source Cursor-like UI for Claude Code that runs multiple Claude Code agents in parallel on Mac and Web platforms with live previews.

name: Coderrr
description: An open-source CLI-first AI coding companion that writes, debugs, and ships code. Like Claude Code but free and open source with support for multiple providers including Ollama for local models.
community_quotes: big fan of the CLI-first approach for those of us who live outside VS Code
CLI-first + pluggable providers (Ollama/OpenRouter/etc.) is a solid 'inspectable agent' direction
local/Ollama support is a strong differentiator

name: IQuest Coder V1
description: An open-source AI coding model from Ubiquant's hedge fund lab that matches Claude Sonnet 4.5 and GPT performance with only 40B parameters using novel Code-Flow training on commit histories and repository evolution patterns.
community_quotes: matches or beats the best commercial models with 20x fewer parameters
self hosted coding assistants using IQuest become common

name: GitLab Duo Agent Platform
description: An agentic AI orchestration platform for DevSecOps that enables teams to orchestrate AI agents across the entire software lifecycle, featuring Agentic Chat, foundational agents, custom agents, and prebuilt flows for CI/CD, security, and code review workflows.
community_quotes: Having GitLab Duo AI agents embedded in our system of record for code, tests, CI/CD, and the entire software development lifecycle boosts productivity
marks a fundamental shift in how AI delivers value in software development
orchestrate AI agents across the entire lifecycle in one unified system

name: Knowns CLI
description: An AI-first CLI for task management and documentation that links docs in tasks and uses AI to read context automatically to avoid repeating patterns every session.
